Chief complaint.cc_description: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe in the patient's words)

symptom_{n}.length: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:0-24 (Unit: week, over 24 is represented as 24))

Present illness.triggering factor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:The reason patient came to the hospital at this time)
Present illness.stressor: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:(multiple answers available) home/work/school/legal issue/medical comorbidity/interpersonal difficulty/null)

Past psychiatric history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of past psychiatric history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'Past psychiatric history' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)

diagnosis_{n}.when: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:Enter the patient's age at the time of the event, not the date)
diagnosis_{n}.length: blank (data_type:number, range_candidate_guide:0-24 (Unit: week, over 24 is represented as 24))

encounter_{n}.modality: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:(multiple answers available) medication/CBT/psychotherapy/light therapy/biofeedback/ECT/group therapy/other)
encounter_{n}.side effect: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide: If there was any side effect (weight gain or loss, GI symptoms, abuse/dependence, sexual dysfunctions, injury of organ like liver/kidney, extrapyramidal syndrome, etc.), fill in this item. Otherwise, leave it as null.)
encounter_{n}.reason for discontinuing: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:non-effective/financial problem/moving to new town/null (If there was discontinuing, fill in this item. Otherwise, leave it as null.))

Past medical history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of past medical history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'Past medical history' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)
Past medical history.history_{n}: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe a past medical history)

current medication_{n}.medication name: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Name of the medication the patient is currently taking)
current medication_{n}.side effect: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:If there was a side effect, fill in this item. Otherwise, leave it as null.)

Family history.presence: blank (data_type:boolean, range_candidate_guide: Randomize(50%) the presence or absence of family history. If 'false', then remove all children of 'Family history' except this 'presence' which has 'false' as a child.)
Family history.diagnosis_{n}: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide: Describe a psychiatric family history. Given the patient's current diagnosis, set a probable family history.)
Family history.substance_use_{n}: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide: Describe a family history of substance use (alcohol, opioid, cannabinoid, hallucinogen, stimulant, narcotic, etc.).)

Developmental/Social history.abnormality in prenatal/birthing history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) presence/absence. If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter null.)
Developmental/Social history.delay in developmental milestone: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Randomize(50%) presence/absence. If yes, write a description; otherwise, enter null.)

childhood history.social environment: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like number and quality of friends.)

Developmental/Social history.school history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:special education/learning disorder/behavioral problem/low academic performance/problem in extracurricular activity)
Developmental/Social history.work history: blank (data_type:string, range_candidate_guide:Describe things like job, performance, reason for switching jobs, relationship with supervisor, coworker, etc.)
